articles.title: Google Meet can now remove noise from video calls in real time - Livemint
articles.description: Google isn’t the first, or the only one to be working on features like this either.Noise suppression has always been part of Microsoft's Teams app and Skype, but it will be improving the feature sometime this year
articles.content: Google on Wednesday demonstrated a new machine learning (ML) feature on Meet -- its video conferencing service which eliminates background noise from video calls in real time. You might be nervous an… [+2009 chars]
